title: Fantasy Football Draft Breakdown (Football 05/02)
description:
Jamey Eisenberg and Dave Richard join Will Brinson to talk about the fantasy football implications of the 2018 NFL Draft, including where they would take Saquon Barkley, who were the winners from the NFL draft, who were losers in the NFL draft, who are some sleeper rookie running backs they're identifying next year, how the rookie wide receiver and tight end class look, who are some of "their guys" heading into the offseason and basic thoughts on early draft strategy. A must-listen for fantasy fans.
